description.value:
Trigger A Medium or larger creature moves through the cell at a faster pace than simply Stepping, or more than one Medium or larger creature enter the cell at the same time

Effect The ceiling and walls of the cell collapse, creating a thunderous roar. All creatures in the cell must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:25] save; the cell then becomes greater difficult terrain that can be passed through safely.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(1d10+6)[bludgeoning]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(2d10+13)[bludgeoning]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] by fallen rubble (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] DC 25).

Critical Failure The creature is buried in the rubble. They take @Damage[(3d10+19)[bludgeoning]] damage and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] (Escape DC 25). Until they escape, the creature must hold their breath or risk suffocating.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: Remaining Air]

details.description: A section of ceiling and iron cell bars collapse inward.
details.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:22] (trained) or @Check[crafting|dc:25] (trained) to use a loose iron bar to shore up the ceiling.
